subject: Re: Passing arguments to subroutine
body:
On May 31, 9:27 am, almatir...@gmail.com (Alma) wrote:
> sub delete_file()
> {
>         my $self = shift;
>         my $file_path = @_;

That sets $file_path to the number of arguments in the call to the
method delete_file().

To set $file_path to the first of the arguments in the call to the
method delete_file()...

        my ($file_path) = @_;
